/usr/bin/c++   -fopenmp -pthread -O3   CMakeFiles/gpuconv.exe.dir/gpu_test.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gpuconv.exe.dir/Sky/sky.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gpuconv.exe.dir/Scan/scan.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gpuconv.exe.dir/Polbeam/polbeam.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gpuconv.exe.dir/Sphtrigo/sphtrigo.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gpuconv.exe.dir/Convolver/convolver.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gpuconv.exe.dir/GpuConvolver/gpuconvolver.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cuda_compile_1.dir/GpuConvolver/cuda/cuda_compile_1_generated_cudaconv.cu.o  -o gpuconv.exe   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib: /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so /usr/local/lib/libhealpix_cxx.so -lcfitsio -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
